titleStmt.title: An abstract of some branches of His Maiesties late charter, granted to the tobacco-pipe makers of VVestminster, declaring His Maiesties pleasure touching that manufacture, and also all persons whom it may concern
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: Imprint information suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Witnesse Our selfe at Westminster the sixth day of October, in the seuenteenth yeere of Our Raigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland, the three and fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
